message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is worth more than $12000 to us, but I'm willing to consider a fair price that suits both of us. To start, let me propose a price of $15000. I believe this reflects the value we place on it while also leaving room for negotiation. Looking forward to your response.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm looking to get out of the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
